notes:
Lethal Lissy is one of the pirates who constantly tries to loot Liberty Bay with overwhelming invasions of pirates. If you see her around Liberty Bay, it's not a good sign.

{{JSpoiler| You get a chance to kill her in the [[Killing in the Name of... Quest]] after killing '''3000 pirates''' for [[Raymond Striker]]. The teleporter is located [http://tibia.wikia.com/wiki/Mapper?coords{{=}}124.233-128.85-1-4-1-1 here].
[[File:Lethal_Lissy_-_Killing_in_the_Name_of.._Quest.png|thumb|left|Lethal Lissy]]






}}
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-160}}|{{Healing|range=150}}|{{Summon|Pirate Cutthroat|4}}|{{Ability|[[Musical Notes]]|a purple field of music notes appears in front of Lethal Lissy|element=?}} }}
name: Lethal Lissy
location: West of Eleonore's castle, near the Guild House "The Ivy Cottage".
strategy: Using an ultimate attack, or focusing SD's on Lethal Lissy is recomended to get the most experience and loot the addon item.
